wikipedia_page.main: Emma Louise Lipman (born 23 February 1989) is a professional footballer who plays as a defender for Como of Serie B, the second level of women's league football in Italy. Lipman was born and brought up in England but chose to play for Malta at international level.

link_mentions.page: List of foreign FA Women's Super League players

response: Her performances for the club in the 2017–18 season led to Soffia winning an award at the 18th edition of the Gran Galà del Calcio ceremony. The newly formed A.S. Roma women's team would sign Angelica Soffia, along with fellow Verona player Emma Lipman, for Roma's inaugural 2018–19 Serie A league campaign.
